name: SkyQuest v2.0webGl
description:
A puzzle logic browser- game with  Pony heroes and kawaii food. 

Deliver goodies to the appropriate consumer using combinations and sequence of moves in 2D space.

Select pawn with clicking mouse or pressing E/Q then press Arrow Keys to transport it. Goal is to deliver it to appropriate pony and present.

Play in your browser with Mouse and/or Keyboard.
Web Gl.
